College_Name: M S Engineering College - [MSEC], Bangalore

Muniswamy Raju, the founder President of the trust and Mr. Sudarshan Raju, the secretary of the trust. It offers UG courses in CSE, ECE, AI&ML, ME and Civil Engineering, PG courses in M. Tech-VLSI and Embedded Systems, Computer Science and Engineering and Machine Design. MSEC also offers Ph.D. programs in Computer Science and Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering and Mechanical Engineering. All the courses are approved by AICTE, New Delhi and affiliated to VTU, Belagavi, Karnataka. The college is NAAC accredited, ISO 9001:2015 Certified, adopted an outcome-based education system and implemented NEP 2020. MSEC ranks in top 100 engineering college by Higher education review 2023. Admission is done on the merit-based and cutoff criteria of the institute.

PES Institute of Technology
College_Summary: PES Institute of Technology is an affiliation of Visvesvarya Technological University, Belgaum. The college offers 6 BE courses, 2 M.Tech Courses, and 1 MBA program with various specializations. Admission to these courses is mostly entrance-based. The entrance exam accepted for the MBA exams is Karnataka PGCET and KMAT. PESIT Bangalore KPGCET cut off for the MBA (Finance) in 2017 was 399 for the general category. PESIT Bangalore placements offer INR 3 LPA of average salary package in top-recruiting companies such as Genpact, ExtraMarks, TCS, Wipro, Global edge, etc.

College_Name: GITAM School of Technology, Bangalore
College_Summary: GITAM School of Technology, Bangalore comes under the aegis of GITAM Bangalore. The institute offers UG, PG and PhD courses in the discipline of Engineering and Technology. GITAM University (Visakhapatnam), assosciate institute of GITAM Bangalore, is ranked 67th in NIRF-2021 University Rankings.

College_Name: Faculty of Hospitality Management and Catering Technology - [FHMCT], M. S. Ramaiah University of Applied Sciences, Bangalore
College_Summary: Ramaiah College of Hotel Management is an institute that provided education on hospitality services and was established in 1993. Ramaiah College of Hotel Management is part of the prestigious Gokula Education Foundation with the objective of giving deserving students the opportunity to pursue higher studies in the fields of Hotel Management. The college was set up with a mission to fulfil the commitment of imparting a value-based, service-oriented training to create hospitality professionals endowed with knowledge, attitude and ability to meet the industry’s challenges. The Vision of the college is to establish as an international, advanced learning centre that imparts the highest values of hospitality and courtesy, in the service of mankind. The college aims to impart the highest levels of hospitality training, to ensure quality, service-oriented, professionals and to be recognized as the training ground for wholesome students- creative, decisive, proactive and responsible citizens. Over the years, it has attracted youth from all across the nation to be groomed into the most sought-after hospitality professionals and has helped them develop leadership and team skills in to make them self-directed, environment-conscious citizens with humane values.

R.R. School of Architecture, Bangalore
College_Summary: R.R School of Architecture, Bangalore, Karnataka was established in 2014. The institute is a part of RR Institutions, Bangalore. The college offers a Bachelor’s program in Architecture. Admission to its B.Arch course is based on the candidate’s performance in the NATA, CET, or COMED-K examination. To be eligible for admission, candidates must have completed their 10+2 in Science stream from a recognized board. The institute has also a dedicated placement cell that guides the students in getting their desired jobs. Some of the prominent recruiters of the campus are Wipro, IBM, Accenture, etc.

College_Name: RNS School of Architecture - [RNSSA], Bangalore
College_Summary: RNSSA is a private architecture college located in Bengaluru. The college was founded in the year 2017 with the motto, “Think globally, act locally!”. The college is affiliated to Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU), Belgaum and approved by the Council of Architecture (CoA), New Delhi.

College_Name: East West School of Architecture - [EWSA], Bangalore
College_Summary: East West School of Architecture (EWSA) is a well-known educational institution which is established in year 2018. The institute is situated in Bangalore, Karnataka and falls under the banner Subramanya Education Society. This society was founded by a philanthropist and well-known social worker Shri. CM Nagaraj in year 1968. Today the institution has become the knowledge house to thousands of student across the globe who are willing to learn in field of Architecture.

RRIAS Bangalore currently offers a 2 years MBA with Dual Specialization in the discipline of Marketing, Finance, HR, Banking, Insurance, Finance Services, and many more. There are certificate courses that are also imparted in various specialisations. Check: RRIAS Courses & Fees
